When Naruto teaches this technique to [[Konohamaru Sarutobi]], Konohamaru initially struggles to take an attractive form;''Naruto'' chapter 2 in the anime, Naruto helps him improve by having him look at naked women.''Naruto'' episode 2 With practice, Konohamaru is eventually able to use this technique effectively, though ''[[Rin no Sho]]'' describes his version as not having the same "wow" factor as Naruto's.
